messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello Station, I'm proud to be your captain and I have just one request don't all die. Have a good day

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We cannot let the changelings get off of this station. Hunt them down and eliminate them.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If the threat isn't dealt with I'll have no choice but to blow up the station, We have to contain it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a whoop of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So do you guys just wanna try and get the fuck out of here?
